mapper.select:
SELECT COMPANY_SEQ AS seq, USER_ORGANIZATION AS name FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL='OP'
AND COMPANY_SEQ BETWEEN '2001' AND '2005'
AND COMPANY_SEQ = #{ptnCompSeq}
GROUP BY COMPANY_SEQ, USER_ORGANIZATION ORDER BY COMPANY_SEQ ASC

SELECT SEQ AS SEQ, NAME AS NAME FROM TB_PROGRESS_STATUS WHERE 1=1
AND CODE IN ('2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8')
AND CODE IN ('2', '3', '5', '6', '7', '8')
ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TID_SEQ AS SEQ, TID_MODEL_NAME AS NAME FROM TB_TERMINAL_MODEL ORDER BY TID_SEQ ASC
SELECT VM_SEQ AS SEQ, VM_MODEL_NAME AS NAME FROM TB_VM_MODEL ORDER BY VM_MODEL_NAME ASC
SELECT TRB_SEQ AS SEQ, TRB_NAME AS NAME FROM TB_TROUBLE ORDER BY TRB_NAME ASC
SELECT RT_SEQ AS SEQ, RT_NAME AS NAME FROM TB_REAL_TROUBLE ORDER BY RT_NAME ASC
SELECT AT_SEQ AS SEQ, AT_NAME AS NAME FROM TB_ACTION_TROUBLE ORDER BY AT_NAME ASC
SELECT SEQ AS SEQ, NAME AS NAME, R_TYPE AS TYPE FROM TB_REVISION ORDER BY SEQ ASC

SELECT SEQ AS SEQ, NAME AS NAME, T_TYPE AS TYPE FROM TB_ERROR WHERE 1=1
AND T_TYPE IN ('RT', 'RA')
AND T_TYPE NOT IN ('RT', 'RA')
ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT COMP_SEQ AS SEQ, COMP_NAME || '(' || BUSINESS_NO || ')' AS NAME FROM TB_COMPANY ORDER BY COMP_SEQ ASC

SELECT TU.USER_SEQ AS SEQ, TU.USER_ID AS USERID, TU.USER_NAME AS USERNAME, TU.USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, TU2.USER_ORGANIZATION AS COMPANYNAME FROM TB_USER TU LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMPANY_SEQ, USER_LEVEL, USER_ORGANIZATION FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL = 'OP' AND USER_NAME != 'PC클리닉(서울경기)' GROUP BY COMPANY_SEQ, USER_LEVEL, USER_ORGANIZATION) TU2 ON TU.COMPANY_SEQ = TU2.COMPANY_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND TU.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR TU.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR TU2.USER_ORGANIZATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY TU.REG_TIMESTAMP DESC, TU.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SEQ, T_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME AS NAME, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_ERROR WHERE T_TYPE NOT IN ('RT', 'RA') UNION SELECT VM_SEQ AS SEQ, 'VM' AS TYPE, VM_MODEL_NAME AS NAME, VM_REG_TIMESTAMP AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_VM_MODEL TVM UNION SELECT TID_SEQ AS SEQ, 'TERMINAL' AS TYPE, TID_MODEL_NAME AS NAME, TID_REGDATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_TERMINAL_MODEL TTM) A WHERE 1 = 1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE DESC, NAME ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SEQ, T_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME AS NAME, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_ERROR WHERE T_TYPE IN ('RT', 'RA') UNION SELECT SEQ, R_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME AS NAME, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_REVISION TR) A WHERE 1 = 1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE DESC, NAME ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SEQ, T_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME AS NAME, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_ERROR UNION SELECT VM_SEQ AS SEQ, 'VM' AS TYPE, VM_MODEL_NAME AS NAME, VM_REG_TIMESTAMP AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_VM_MODEL TVM UNION SELECT TID_SEQ AS SEQ, 'TERMINAL' AS TYPE, TID_MODEL_NAME AS NAME, TID_REGDATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_TERMINAL_MODEL TTM UNION SELECT SEQ, R_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME AS NAME, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE FROM TB_REVISION TR ) A WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE DESC, NAME ASC

insert.if: INSERT INTO TB_REVISION (SEQ, R_TYPE, NAME) VALUES (NEXTVAL('TB_REVISION_SEQ'), #{type}, #{name})

if.test: type == "RT" or type == "RA" or type == "CT" or type == "CR" or type == "CA"

insert.if: INSERT INTO TB_ERROR (SEQ, T_TYPE, NAME) VALUES (NEXTVAL('TB_ERROR_SEQ'), #{type}, #{name})

if.test: settingType == "RT" or settingType == "RA" or settingType == "CT" or settingType == "CR" or settingType == "CA"

delete.if: DELETE FROM TB_ERROR WHERE T_TYPE = #{settingType} AND SEQ = #{seq}
